name: Project 1: Solar System Simulation
description:
An interactive moving model of all major celestial bodies within our solar system, barre the moons of planets besides that of Earth. Not to scale to prevent it from breaking any computers but to scale in the way a science fair solar system diorama is. Includes the actual recordings of the sounds each planet makes, as "recorded" by Nasa and somewhat accurate orbits, axis tilts and rotations.  Plus a few comets for fun.

*Disclaimer: cursor accuracy leaves much to be desired.

Credits:

Game, desktop icon and cursor by dickie

Textures as provided

Sounds of Planets from NASA, probably
